Package votAppAPI.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
votAppAPI.controller.Controller
@RestController public class Controller extends Object
Controller class for handling requests related to projects and degrees.

    • tornaInfoProjecte

      @GetMapping("/votApp/project") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> tornaInfoProjecte(@RequestParam("nom") String strVariable)
      Retrieves information about projects based on the provided name.
      Parameters:
      strVariable - The name of the project to retrieve information for.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing JSON representation of the project information.

    • tornaInfoDegree

      @GetMapping("/votApp/degree") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> tornaInfoDegree(@RequestParam("abbreviation") String strVariable)
      Retrieves information about degrees based on the provided abbreviation.
      Parameters:
      strVariable - The abbreviation of the degree to retrieve information for.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing JSON representation of the degree information.

    • putNovaRessenya

      @PutMapping("votApp/novaRessenya") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> putNovaRessenya(@RequestParam("name") String projectName, @RequestBody String valuationJSON)
      Adds a new review to an existing project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project to add the review to.
      valuationJSON - The JSON representation of the review to be added.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating the status of the operation.

    • deleteProject

      @DeleteMapping("votApp/borrarProject") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteProject(@RequestParam("creator") String creator)
      Deletes a project based on the creator's identifier.
      Parameters:
      creator - The identifier of the creator associated with the project to be deleted.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating the status of the operation.

    • projectExists

      public boolean projectExists(String nom)
      Checks if a project with the given name exists.
      Parameters:
      nom - The name of the project to check existence for.
      Returns:
      True if a project with the given name exists, false otherwise.

    • valorationExistsWithNie

      public boolean valorationExistsWithNie(String nie, Project project)
      Checks if a valuation with the given NIE exists for the specified project.
      Parameters:
      nie - The NIE (identification number) to check for within valuations.
      project - The project object to search for the valuation.
      Returns:
      True if a valuation with the given NIE exists for the project, false otherwise.

    • creatorExists

      public boolean creatorExists(String creator)
      Checks if a project exists for the given creator.
      Parameters:
      creator - The identifier of the creator to check for associated projects.
      Returns:
      True if a project exists for the given creator, false otherwise.
